page.title: 09Social Survey D - Shopping
page.content: 100 households in the area were asked :{"Where do you go shopping for: {a) convenience goods (bread, meat, {sweets, cigarettes, groceries etc.) } {b) occasional goods (clothing, {electrical equipment, furniture, etc.) ______________________________________ {convenience goods} {occasional goods} ROLVENDEN/LAYNE 71 TENTERDEN 57 TENTERDEN 47 ASHFORD 41 ASHFORD 28 MAIDSTONE 39 HASTINGS 22 TUNBRIDGE WELLS 31 MAIDSTONE 14 HASTINGS 25 CRANBROOK 10 CRANBROOK 13 RYE 9 RYE 12 OTHER VILLAGES 6 LONDON 11 HAWKHURST 4 CANTERBURY 9 TUNBRIDGE WELLS 2 ROLVENDEN/LAYNE 3 CANTERBURY 2 MEDWAY TOWNS 2 FOLKESTONE 2 FOLKESTONE 2 LONDON 1 OTHER VILLAGES 1 MEDWAY TOWNS 0 HAWKHURST 1
